weather_report:
As the amber hues of twilight draw the curtain over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries whispers of a slight drizzle that has now faded into nothingness. The wind dances playfully, reminding us of its presence with gentle gusts that streak through the streets, cooling the warm remnants of the day. The forecast hints at a clear night, with temperatures settling around a cozy 56 degrees. This time of year, the city often dons a cloak of fog, yet tonight it seems to be holding its breath, offering a rare glimpse of the skyline unadorned. 

Tomorrow’s sun promises to rise bright and engaging, casting its benevolence across the city. Expect a gentle, sun-kissed day with a high near 67, perfect for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet visit to one of the local coffee shops. As the day progresses, a gradual drop in temperature will remind us that the evening still holds a secret chill. For attire, layers are the key; a light jacket may serve well against the evening breeze, while a breathable shirt will keep you comfortable during the sun’s embrace. With the weather unfolding so invitingly, it’s the perfect day to explore the hidden corners of the Mission or take a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park, immersing yourself in the city’s vibrant rhythm as it winds down to night.
